sentences.en: A knife is sharpened on the grindstone; steel is tempered in fire.
sentences.cn: 刀在石上磨, 钢在火中炼.

sentences.en: An emery wheel is the modern variation of a grindstone.
He sharpened the edge of his knife on a grindstone.
sentences.cn: 他在磨石上磨快了他的刀刃.

sentences.en: He's got to keep grindstone to feed his six children.
sentences.cn: 他得一刻不停拼命做才能养活他那“六”个孩子.

sentences.en: He's got to keep his nose to the grindstone to feed his six children.
sentences.cn: 他得一刻不停拼命做才能养活他那六个孩子.

sentences.en: His large growing family kept his nose to the grindstone.
sentences.cn: 他的日益增多的家庭人口使他埋头从事辛苦的工作.

sentences.en: I never mind your kind reminding me that the grindstone hinders you.
sentences.cn: 我决不介意你的好意提醒我说磨刀石妨碍了你.

sentences.en: I never mind your unkind reminding that my grindstone hellonders your cylinder.
sentences.cn: 我决不介意你不友善的提醒说我的磨刀石故障了你的汽缸.

sentences.en: I never mind your unkind reminding that my grindstone hinders your cylinder.
sentences.cn: 我决不介意你不友善的提醒说我的磨刀石妨碍了你的汽缸.

sentences.en: It's a pity I have to get back to the grindstone.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是我不得不回去工作.

sentences.en: Someone who keeps his nose to the grindstone works very hard.
sentences.cn: 有的人埋头苦干,工作非常勤劳.

sentences.en: Take the sickle which is lying on the grindstone.
sentences.cn: 把磨刀石上的那把镰刀拿去.

sentences.en: The right of a polished stone is the grindstone.
sentences.cn: Radianfullyconsistent最右边的一块是磨制石器的磨刀石.

sentences.en: The teacher believed in hard work and always kept our noses to the grindstone.
sentences.cn: 老师提倡勤奋,而且也总是要我们埋头读书.

sentences.en: This job really makes you put your nose to the grindstone.
sentences.cn: 这份工作确实使你辛苦得气都喘不上来.

put (one's) nose to the grindstone【非正式用语】

trans.tran_cn: 磨石，砂轮，持续辛勤地工作，努力不懈
